name: Crawloop
description:
Ludum Dare 47 Compo entry, theme: "Stuck in a loop".

Small puzzle game with 8 levels. A dungeon crawler where every dungeon floor is the same. For each dungeon, you need to collect the orb on floor 3 before you can escape through the red staircase on floor 1.

If you collect all 8 orbs you will reverse the evil wizard's spell which turned you into a slug.

This is a prototype. More levels and mechanics are planned.
